title: Unban
body: Hey Riot! Is there anyway i could get a ban lifted off an old account that was the first account i created for League of Legends? It was banned for being overly AFK / Disconnecting from games, if we could at least discuss this or possibly get the ban lifted i would appreciate it very much! Thanks!

replies.body: I can't say for sure since I can't see why the other account was banned, but you're always welcome to hit us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to open up that discussion!
